---
title: "Resources"
---



We have a number of resources that will help you while integrating CometChat in your app.

## 1. All Real-Time Delegates (Listeners)

The CometChat provides you with live events related to users, groups, messages, and calls. [Click here to learn more about Real-time Listeners](/sdk/ios/2.0/all-real-time-delegates-listeners).

***

## 2. Publishing to the App Store

<Frame>
  <img src="/images/a7ce7b40-1625154756-8f90c8581c43daa86366c98f8e952a2c.png" />
</Frame>

To publish your App on App Store please [follow this guide](/sdk/ios/2.0/publishing-app-on-appstore).

***

## 3. Increment App Icon Badge Count

<Frame>
  <img src="data:image/png;base64," />
</Frame>

Learn how to [increment your app's icon badge count](/sdk/ios/2.0/increment-app-icon-badge-count).

***

## 4. API Reference (Swift Doc)

Learn more about [iOS SDK's public API's](https://docs.cometchat.io/ios/v2.0/swiftdocs/index.html).

***

## 5. Upgrading from v1

<Frame>
  <img src="/images/dfae7088-UAAAAYdEVYdGV4aWY6UGl4ZWxZRGltZW5zaW9uADIxN14Eu6AAAAAASUVORK5CYII.png" />
</Frame>

Upgrading from v1.x to v2 is fairly simple. [Click here to know about the major changes that are released as a part of CometChat Pro v2](/sdk/ios/2.0/upgrading-from-v1).

***

## 6. Remove Delivered Notifications

Learn [how to remove delivered notifications](/sdk/ios/2.0/remove-delivered-notifications).

***

## 7. Launch call screen on tap of push notification

<Frame>
  <img src="/images/ea07ee08-1623200439-c7b9fd90f64ad8d19c5240085fa241fd.jpg" />
</Frame>

Learn [how to launch an incoming call screen from the UI Kit library on receiving an incoming call notification](/sdk/ios/2.0/launch-call-screen-on-tap-of-push-notification).

***

## 8. Launch chat window on tap of push notification

<Frame>
  <img src="/images/08cdf987-1623200440-03f865d337fcaade4b2092abf8721a03.jpg" />
</Frame>

Learn [how to launch a chat window from the UI Kit library on receiving a new message notification](/sdk/ios/2.0/launch-chat-window-push-notification).
